name: Merry Christmas Jason Barnabe
description: Christmas lights for Userstyles.org. No beagle, no blanket, no fir tree, no jazz - just blinkin' lights.
additional_info: Only Firefox will blink the lights - Chrome won't animate generated content like :before and :after. Nope - it works in Chrome now, too. If trying out different patterns, reload the page after you Preview or Install a new pattern - otherwise, Firefox will continue to use (some of) the previous pattern.

style_setting_options.label: in a couple of long loops
in several short loops
On and off
style_setting_options.value:
-webkit-animation: blink 2.5s steps(1,end) infinite;
    animation: blink 2.5s steps(1,end) infinite;

style_setting_options.label: Chase (on off on off ...)
Chase (on on off off ...)
Chase all on, chase all off
